name: Contra Climate (GGJ 2022)
description:
Premise:

On the planet of Contra, formerly named Earth, an Apocalypse has swept over the planet and has caused extreme never before seen climates of ice and fire at once.

Scientists developed 2 special species that can possibly save the planet. You play as a ice cat and hot dog who can survive the extreme cold and heat.

With teamwork, you collect items throughout the game to bring the weather back to moderate, livable temperature.

Controls:

WASD to move.

Escape to quit to menu.

Credits:

Programming by Alex003

Audio by Hornlitz

Art by JamesExcalibur (Instagram)

Art by Yinawang (Instagram)

Notes:

Created in a weekend for Global Game Jam 2022 Vancouver. Theme of duality.
